modName: Kissmiax ECE and RACEMENU Orc preset
summary:
- The preset of Kissmiax (orc) for ECE and RACEMENU
- Savage and delicate :)
- For axe lovers
- Green
- Optional msn.dds
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#ff00ff]My blog (showcase and tips)[/color] [url=https://skyrimscandal.blogspot.com/]SKYRIM SCANDAL[/url][/size][/center][url=https://skyrimscandal.blogspot.com/]

[img width=860,height=319]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84802-0-1498145222.jpg[/img]
[/url]
[size=4]She is Sharn gra-Rugdush aka Kissmiax in Skyrim.
Kissmiax (Sharn) is well know in Skyrim for her violence....specially with axes. Her delicate face is a lure and many warriors learned the lesson.
Her father (Rugdush) learned her the art of smithing and the advantage of a fast fight. Kissmiax is now specialized in 1 handed or 2 handed axes......close combat......tank.

Orcs like gold......and Kissmiax too. She offers her services as bodyguard in all existing orc strongholds in Tamriel.....for a big pile of shiny gold.
She would like to act as the housecarl to Jarl Balgruuf the greater, but the role is already taken by Irileth. Too bad for her. The splendor and the prestige of Whiterun is her goal. She tries to find a solution to take the job. Jarl Balgruuf is the sort of man she wants to serve.

                            ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This "mod" includes:
- The face preset of Kissmiax for ECE or RACEMENU
- Optional : Her full muscular msn.dds textures to fit to the concept. (Famous and FSC[/size][size=4])
- The ECE/RACEMENU conversion has been made by TRIPTHERIFT
- Kissmiax is a true orsimer race. [/size]

[img width=847,height=251]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84802-0-1498147148.jpg[/img]


[center][size=4][color=#ff00ff][size=5][u]REQUIREMENTS:[/u][/size][/color]

[/size][size=4]Enhanced Characters Edit (ECE) by TKTK1 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]HERE[/url]
OR
RACEMENU by Expired [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]HERE[/url]

And good axes in your games....with sharp edges ;)[/size][/center][size=4]
[/size][u][size=4]
[/size][/u]
[size=4][color=#ff00ff][u][size=5]HIGHLY RECOMMENDED[/size][size=5] and CREDITS[/size][/u]:[/color]

- FAIR SKIN COMPLEXION by Hhaley [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]HERE[/url] (skin textures, tint, complexion, brows, mouth )
Take the version you want (CBBE if CBBE body, UNP if UNP body) version 9.2. Eyes option is not necessary.

- A dentist for Orsimers by Redtox [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69378/?]HERE[/url] . It's the mouth orc retex.

- The eyes of beauty by Lograam [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]HERE[/url] . She uses the [/size][size=4]"EyeOrcIceBlue.dds"

- HAIR : KS HAIRDOS RENEWAL [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]HERE[/url]. She uses the Newyorker haircut.[/size]

[size=4]- TRIPTHERIFT for the conversion ECE/RACEMENU[/size]

[size=4]- Warpaint and scars are vanilla[/size]

[img width=850,height=171]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84802-0-1498148363.jpg[/img]



[color=#ff00ff][size=5][u]INSTALLATION:[/u][/size][/color]

[size=4][u]For ECE users:[/u]

1) copy/paste manually the ECE preset "_11_commonTriRaces" in documents/mygames/skyrim/CME_save
2) In game, select the ORC RACE
3) Select the weight_0. This will prevent neck seams (because Kissmiax is originally weight_0)
4) Load the preset SLOT 11
5) Kissmiax appears!
6) Apply modifications you desire, then save your own new preset.
[u]
For RACEMENU users[/u]

1) copy all the content of my racemenu file in data/skse/plugins/chargen
2) select the ORC RACE
3) select the weight_0. [/size][size=4]This will prevent neck seams (because Kissmiax is originally weight_0)
4) Import head in the sculpt tab (F11)
5) Kissmiax appears!
6) [/size][size=4]Apply modifications you desire, then save your own new preset.[/size]


[center][color=#ff00ff][size=5]Kissmiax's body[/size][/color][/center][img width=805,height=281]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84802-0-1498153068.jpg[/img]



[size=4]- You are free to use the bodyshape you want (CBBE or UNP). In my game, Kissmiax is UUNP (Unperky weight_0)[/size].[size=4] Thanks Zwabberdiebo for the advice.....I recognize the specialist ;) That's perfect for her.
[/size]
[size=4]- In the optional file, you will find her full body msn (head, body, hand). This is only for UNP familly users. These textures are her muscles. I made them with the mod FAMOUS and FSC. Use them if you want the full concept.
Note: Place the body and the hand textures in data/textures/actors/character/female
         Place the head texture in [/size][size=4][size=4]data/textures/actors/character/female[/size]orc
[color=#ff00ff][size=5]
Permissions:[/size][/color]

I have the permission from [/size][size=4]ScrollTron1c[/size][size=4] to use,to modify and to upload here his mod  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72837/?]FAMOUS[/url]
[/size][size=4][size=4]ScrollTron1c[/size] must have all credits for his mod Famous. You have my gratitude.

I have the permission from Hhaley to use and to upload 2 textures from his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]FAIR SKIN COMPLEXION
[/url]HHaley must have all credits for his mod Fair skin Complexion. Thanks for the permission, your mod, the quality. You have my gratefulness.

Famous and FSC 9.2 are fully compatible. They are made to work together....and in 4K.
[/size]
[img width=857,height=236]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84802-0-1498150940.jpg[/img]

[size=5]Thank you

Marmotte

[/size]
